Knowledge Materials for SynthTrace Onboarding

This page helps new users quickly learn and use SynthTrace.

Activity

Description

Resource Link

Core Training (Video)

Short videos introducing each module, including demo dashboards.

ğŸ“º Core Training Video Series

Responsibility Matrix (RACI)

Who does what? Aligns teams to monitoring roles and handoffs.

ğŸ“„ View Matrix

Change Templates (ServiceNow)

Use these templates to submit SynthTrace change requests.

FAQs

Common questions from developers, ops teams, and security folks.

â“ Go to FAQs

Glossary

Terms like “Span,” “Node,” “Replay Session,” explained simply.

ğŸ“˜ Read Glossary

Security Process (Synthetic)

Steps for raising an incident when SynthTrace detects a potential vulnerability.

ğŸ” Incident SOP

# _Knowledge Materials for SynthTrace Onboarding_

This page helps new users quickly learn and use SynthTrace.

Activity| Description| Resource Link  
---|---|---  
**Core Training (Video)**|  Short videos introducing each module, including demo dashboards.| ğŸ“º Core Training Video Series  
**Responsibility Matrix (RACI)**|  Who does what? Aligns teams to monitoring roles and handoffs.| ğŸ“„ View Matrix  
**Change Templates (ServiceNow)**|  Use these templates to submit SynthTrace change requests.| ğŸ§¾ Download Templates  
**FAQs**|  Common questions from developers, ops teams, and security folks.| â“ Go to FAQs  
**Glossary**|  Terms like "Span," "Node," "Replay Session," explained simply.| ğŸ“˜ Read Glossary  
**Security Process (Synthetic)**|  Steps for raising an incident when SynthTrace detects a potential vulnerability.| ğŸ” Incident SOP
